name: Frozen Island
description:
Seek adventure in a dangerous world disguised as a beautiful frozen island! Explore every nook and cranny of this mysterious island to find out what happened to our hero and how he got here. Fight with hideous monsters, futuristic robots and other enemies, but do not forget to keep track of your ammo and health.

Features:

- Lots of weapons (including cold-use).
- Several types of enemies with their own unique abilities.
- Incredibly beautiful, large-scale mining and the frozen plains of the island.
